source_note: State baseline derived from Georgia Environmental Protection Division (EPD) recycling programs.

organics.guidance: Composting and yard waste recycling encouraged under EPD rules.
organics.bin: Green bin or compost drop-off site.
organics.notes: Atlanta and Athens-Clarke County offer organics programs.

paper_cardboard.guidance: Recycle clean paper and cardboard; flatten boxes.

glass_containers.guidance: Recycle bottles and jars (rinsed, no lids).
glass_containers.notes: Glass not accepted in all curbside programs.

metal_containers.guidance: Recycle aluminum and steel/tin cans (clean and empty).

plastics.guidance: Recycle bottles and containers labeled #1â€“#2; check local rules for others.

beverage_containers_crv.bin: Recycle curbside or at drop-off site.

household_batteries.guidance: Recycle rechargeable batteries through HHW events or retailers.

e_waste.guidance: Electronics accepted at drop-off events or recyclers.

plastic_bags_and_film.guidance: Plastic bags and film not accepted curbside.

bulky_items.guidance: Schedule bulky pickup or bring to landfill.
bulky_items.notes: Rules vary by city or county.
